Translations.Text: waqalati l-yahudu laysati l-nasara ʿala shayin waqalati l-nasara laysati l-yahudu ʿala shayin wahum yatluna l-kitaba kadhalika qala alladhina la yaʿlamuna mith'la qawlihim fal-lahu yahkumu baynahum yawma l-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna

waman azlamu mimman manaʿa masajida l-lahi an yudh'kara fiha us'muhu wasaʿa fi kharabiha ulaika ma kana lahum an yadkhuluha illa khaifina lahum fi l-dun'ya khiz'yun walahum fi l-akhirati ʿadhabun ʿazimun
walillahi l-mashriqu wal-maghribu fa-aynama tuwallu fathamma wajhu l-lahi inna l-laha wasiʿun ʿalimun
waqalu ittakhadha l-lahu waladan sub'hanahu bal lahu ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi kullun lahu qanituna
badiʿu l-samawati wal-ardi wa-idha qada amran fa-innama yaqulu lahu kun fayakunu
waqala alladhina la yaʿlamuna lawla yukallimuna l-lahu aw tatina ayatun kadhalika qala alladhina min qablihim mith'la qawlihim tashabahat qulubuhum qad bayyanna l-ayati liqawmin yuqinuna
inna arsalnaka bil-haqi bashiran wanadhiran wala tus'alu ʿan ashabi l-jahimi
